ai.summary: An easy 3 km walk along the Gwinear-Gwithian BR 44 corridor in the UK. The route is gentle and suitable for beginners, families, or a quick outdoor outing.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily gentle, well-defined footpaths with occasional grass, gravel, gates and stiles. Some sections may be muddy after rain. Watch for livestock near farmland and short road crossings.
ai.safety_notes: Even for a short walk, check the weather and wear sturdy footwear. Stay on marked paths, be aware of gates and stiles, and watch for livestock near farmland. If near the coast or water, be mindful of tides and soft ground. Carry water, a basic first aid item, a charged phone, and let someone know your plan if walking alone.
recommended_gear: Map, route notes, or GPS-enabled device
Phone with emergency contacts and offline map
Optional extra layers for changeable weather
ai.best_seasons: All year, with best conditions in spring and summer.

seo.title: Gwinear-Gwithian BR 44 Walk - 3 km Easy Trail in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the easy 3 km Gwinear-Gwithian BR 44 hike in the UK. Find terrain details, safety tips, gear recommendations, and the best seasons for this short rural walk.
